H0.text: In which pastime/game would you use the Forsyth-Edwards Notation or the GBR code. Backgammon

H1.text: In which pastime/game would you use the Forsyth-Edwards Notation or the GBR code. Checkers

H2.text: In which pastime/game would you use the Forsyth-Edwards Notation or the GBR code. Go

H3.text: In which pastime/game would you use the Forsyth-Edwards Notation or the GBR code. CHESS

A4.text: Forsythâ€“Edwards Notation (FEN) is a standard notation for describing a particular board position of a chess game.

A5.text: In the Portable Game Notation for chess games, FEN is used to define initial positions other than the standard one.
